text: Rehoboam gu haganoho ana hagabaubau gii donu, guu wanga nia waawa o ana dama daane guu duwwe digaula laa lodo Judah mo Benjamin i lodo nia waahale ala gu abaaba gi mau dangihi. Mee guu wanga nia mee huogodoo ala e hiihai ginai digaula i lodo di manawa dumaalia, guu wanga labelaa gi digaula nadau lodo dagi logo.
